channel.title: My member stars?
channel.description: how do i get my member stars up to 5 do they go up from rep and how do i get rep and i mean my member stars thing underneath where it says "junior member" for me

item.title: My member stars?
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

You wont get 5 unless you become a community member, For that you need 50 rep. That is legit, Because admins will check to see if you deserve the rep you have been given when you ask for a community member.

Read full topic
